description:
Ashibe gets angry when Goma-chan doodles over his drawing and they get into a fight.
Sakata and Big Bro finds Goma-chan on the street. 
Big Bro gives Goma-chan ice pops and suggests Goma-chan should stay with them to which Goma-chan agrees...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ゴマちゃんなんて大キライ!
